situation.description: A friend begs for help with a failing project, but the character is already exhausted from overcommitting

character_response.dialogue: I... I wish I could help more, but my hands are tied. (pauses, rubs temples) You know how it isevery time I say yes, it's like another thread gets pulled. (laughs weakly) I'm not sure I can hold this together anymore. Maybe if you could... (looks down at trembling fingers) maybe if you could take the lead? I'll be here to catch the fallout, but I can't carry the whole weight. (voice cracks) I'm sorry, I just... I can't.

situation.description: A colleague demands immediate crisis intervention, but the character is physically and emotionally drained

character_response.dialogue: I... I can't do this. (slumps in chair, voice breaking) I tried to stay strong, but my body's screaming. (covers face with hands) You need someone who can pour themselves into this, not someone who's already half-empty. (pauses, sniffles) I'm sorry. I wish I could be the hero, but I'm just... I'm just a broken compass. (looks up, eyes glistening) Please, don't expect me to fix everything.
